message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a decent chunk to get us started.
I'll take a moderate cut, let's see if you'll take it
That's still a bit too generous for you, Bob. I'm not sure I'm ready to give up that much yet.
I'm still looking for a fair split, but I'm willing to compromise. This is my best offer so far.
Time to take a more aggressive stance, let's see if you'll meet me in the middle
Alright, Bob, you're pushing hard, but I think this is a fair compromise. Let's call it a day!
